name: carlos world gen test
description:
a world generation prototype that I may or may not expand upon

currently there are 2 worlds the overworld and hell

the overworld saves when you go through the portal, but hell resets every time you go back in

there are 7 world sizes

Controls:

WAD - Move

Shift/Spacebar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Break

Right Mouse Button - Place

R - Reset world
